tool_description: API Rest to get Colombian Food Recipes
name: Colombian Food Recipes
title: Colombian Food Recipes

api_list.name: Search Food
api_list.description: Gets Colombian Food Recipes that you looking for!

api_list.name: Get All Food Recipes
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all Colombian Food Recipes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://colombian-food-recipes2.p.rapidapi.com/recipes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "colombian-food-recipes2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://colombian-food-recipes2.p.rapidapi.com/recipes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "colombian-food-recipes2.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
